title: Week 1: Project Setup & Research
summary: Set up development environment, studied the codebase architecture, and created initial project documentation. Met with mentors to discuss project timeline and milestones.

title: Week 2: Core Feature Development
summary: Started implementing the core feature. Completed initial prototype and created tests. Discussed implementation approach with mentors and received valuable feedback.

title: Week 3: Testing & Documentation
summary: Added comprehensive test coverage for new features. Updated documentation to reflect changes. Fixed bugs identified during testing phase.

title: Week 4: Code Review & Refinement
summary: Addressed code review comments from mentors. Refactored code for better maintainability. Started working on the next milestone.
